original_text: But the Lord your God himself will go across the river in front of you. He will destroy the nations who live in that land. Then you will live there instead of them. Joshua will lead you across the river, as the Lord has said.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이미 말씀하신 것과 같이 네 하나님 여호와께서 너보다 먼저 건너가사 이 민족들을 네 앞에서 멸하시고 네가 그 땅을 차지하게 할 것이며 여호수아는 네 앞에서 건너갈지라

sentences.original_text: But the Lord your God himself
will go across the river in front of you
Then you will live there instead of them
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너는 그들 대신에 그곳에 살 것이다

sentences.original_text: Joshua will lead you across the river
sentences.korean_translation: 여호수아가 너를 인도하여 강을 건널 것이다
